# currentSyncAnchor(completionHandler:)

**Instance Method**

Returns the current sync anchor.

## Declaration

```swift
optional func currentSyncAnchor(completionHandler: @escaping (NSFileProviderSyncAnchor?) -> Void)
```

```swift
optional func currentSyncAnchor() async -> NSFileProviderSyncAnchor?
```

## Discussion



## Enumerating Items and Changes

- **enumerateItems(for:startingAt:)**: Requests the next batch of items, starting at the specified page.
- **enumerateChanges(for:from:)**: Requests the next batch of changes after the specified sync anchor.
- **invalidate()**: Stops the enumeration of items and changes.

items.description: Requests the next batch of items, starting at the specified page.
items.name: enumerateItems(for:startingAt:)

items.description: Requests the next batch of changes after the specified sync anchor.
